data.text:
[Watch here - https://t.co/ydl4wThmDt] May you enjoy the celebration with your loved ones and the hospitality all around. From all of us at Malaysia Airlines, Selamat Hari Raya, Maaf Zahir dan Batin.

#OpsLipLapRaya #MalaysianHospitality #MalaysiaAirlines https://t.co/9r3XUKyFA8

For this year’s Raya, our team worked together with the Chefs of Istana Arau, Perlis to create some Royal favourites, Kurma Daging Perlis (for First and Business Class) and Kurma Ayam Perlis (for Economy Class) on selected flights from 15 to 17 June 2018. #MalaysiaAirlines https://t.co/xpc062ZOWx
Long layovers? Here at the Golden Lounge, we have a nap room for you to tuck in and refuel for your next journey. https://t.co/AfzbbiAUi9

DYTM Raja Muda Perlis and DYTM Raja Puan Muda Perlis welcomed our Chefs to Istana Arau to create special Kurma Daging Perlis and Kurma Daging Ayam dishes with the palace chef herself. This special dish will be served onboard this festive period. https://t.co/OuXrzxhc6e https://t.co/kyXix9n5R6
Which destination do you think has the best cuisine?

[Watch here - https://t.co/70fyz2i4Z1 ] Welcome your loved ones with warmth and sincerity this festive season with these simple DIY items.
#MalaysiaAirlines #MalaysianHospitality #Raya2018 #OpsLipLapRaya #KekBatik https://t.co/X41gqG0Tw5

Which destination would be the better summer getaway?
Like for Kota Kinabalu
RT for Phuket https://t.co/w64zsaBNnz

Celebrate Hari Raya Aidilfitri and feast away with our special menu for Lunch and Dinner at the Golden Lounge. Guests can savour traditional Raya meals like nasi tomato, lemang and rendang, sayur lodeh and more! #MalaysiaAirlines #MalaysianHospitality https://t.co/ACKIMlRHQw
Sand and sun, summer has begun! Where would be your perfect destination for the summer break? https://t.co/GgHTRikck8

[Watch here - https://t.co/p2KuL4PtcU] Welcome your loved ones with warmth and sincerity this festive season with these simple DIY items.

#MalaysiaAirlines #MalaysianHospitality #Raya2018 #OpsLipLapRaya #SongkokLukis https://t.co/alMV34awjk

Make this school holiday more memorable! Fly with us from 8 - 30 June 2018 and receive our special Kids Activity Pack when you book your Child Meal beforehand. For more info: https://t.co/5JdHTiJuB9 https://t.co/Oh6HmMBf1w

[Watch here - https://t.co/70fyz2i4Z1] Welcome your loved ones with warmth and sincerity this festive season with these simple DIY items.
#MalaysiaAirlines #MalaysianHospitality #Raya2018 #OpsLipLapRaya #KekBatik https://t.co/SIJQjGmRcw

Whether you’re heading back home or overseas for a holiday, these 5 tips will help ensure your travel goes smoothly. 
Have a safe trip and Selamat Hari Raya! #MalaysiaAirlines https://t.co/kJLYxBaaP0

It’s never too late to book your next holiday! Enjoy additional discounts to selected destinations using the code ‘MHSPECIALS’ with our Daylight Specials today. https://t.co/s7KrYLSNKx https://t.co/la1uUsiqrC

data.text:
We just celebrated our inaugural flight to Brisbane and surprised our guests with some goodies. Hope to see you onboard soon!

#MHtoBrisbane #MalaysiaAirlines https://t.co/r71zyK1I85
Quiz time! Which of the destinations we fly to is known as the “Land of the Morning Calm”?

[Watch here: https://t.co/70fyz2i4Z1 ] As Malaysians, our traditions of warmth & sincerity lie at the heart of who we are. It’s through these principles that we learn the essence of Malaysian Hospitality. 

Salam Aidilfitri.

#MalaysiaAirlines #MalaysianHospitality #OpsLipLapRaya https://t.co/3fYfoUDNuh

data.text:
Malaysians always go the extra mile to welcome guests during the Raya season. Watch just how far Danial and friends go on 5 June 2018.

#MalaysiaAirlines #MalaysianHospitality #Raya2018 #OpsLipLapRaya https://t.co/vIrqkf9WDk
[CONTEST] Win a Business Class ticket to any destination of your choice! Find out how to win here: https://t.co/0vUt0LxdSp https://t.co/SLR2RWFFJ8

What are your favourite hidden gems from the destinations we fly to? Share your pictures or stories and don’t forget to hashtag #MalaysiaAirlines
Use code ‘MHSPECIALS’ and enjoy additional discount to selected destinations today between 4AM - 9AM! Don’t miss out, book at https://t.co/Fblprur49f. https://t.co/AvVmRJgBfs

Throughout the month of Ramadan, we will be serving a special menu featuring some delicious Malaysian delicacies for you to break fast at our Golden Lounge. We have delicious bubur lambuk, chicken murtabak and bubur manis to satiate your tastebuds.  #MalaysianHospitality https://t.co/qIjqHqsARo
Everyday is a good day to travel! Where will you be visiting next month? #MalaysiaAirlines

Do you prefer to catch a day or a night flight? #MalaysiaAirlines

RT for day
Like for night

Thanks @hfzabdrhmn (IG) and @flightops_av (IG) for sharing! https://t.co/ooT2wnQsfy
Good morning from KLIA! We hope to see you onboard with us this weekend! #MalaysiaAirlines

As travelers ourselves, we yearn for more experiences, to see and explore more of the world. With our network of destinations, you’ll have more opportunities to experience our hospitality wherever your adventure takes you.

#MalaysiaAirlines #MalaysianHospitality https://t.co/HkzTZ9Ep9t

“The traveler sees what he sees, the tourist sees what he has come to see.” 
Are you a traveler or a tourist? #MalaysiaAirlines 

RT for traveler
Like for tourist

We understand that every journey is different. It begins by knowing someone’s needs even before them asking. So they will still feel at home even when they are miles away.

#MalaysiaAirlines #MalaysianHospitality https://t.co/t8WAfgW0QO

data.text: Congratulations to the first batch of Malaysia Airlines Berhad’s Cabin Crew graduates! We’re proud of our MH ambassadors and can’t wait for them to welcome you onboard! #MalaysiaAirlines #MalaysianHospitality https://t.co/tQhWQatOJq
Do you know where the oldest rainforest in the world is located? Hint: it’s in our home country 🇲🇾. #MalaysiaAirlines

It’s our hospitality that defines who we are and where we come from. It’s this belief that travels with us wherever we go. So you’ll feel at home no matter where the world takes you.

#MalaysiaAirlines #MalaysianHospitality https://t.co/EhfXOM8U3A
